long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This chrome extension automatically detects and mutes sound when an advertisement is played on Spotify. It allows users to enjoy their music without interruption from ads, and can be easily enabled or disabled with the click of a button.
